title: Ted Bundy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/2/21
itunes:title: Ted Bundy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/2/21
description:
George Noory and author Katie Mahon discuss her encounter with the serial killer Ted Bundy, how he lured her into a hotel to possibly attack her, and the miraculous encounter with a possible angel that saved her life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
